resources.string:
It just amazes me every time how bad Google Play Store/Developer/Console/Review experience is.

My app is on the store (no name to avoid the promotion ban).

The last version has been approved 2 weeks ago. All is good.
Something that still is unanswered to me is that does Jetpack Compose gonna deprecate Activities/Fragments/XML?
